title: Why use an accordion?
content: Accordions help organize large amounts of content into manageable sections, improving user experience by allowing users to focus on one topic at a time and reducing page clutter, ideal for FAQs or product features.

title: How do I add more items?
content: To add more items, simply add another object to the data array, following the same structure with a unique ID, a title, and its corresponding content.
